verse2 (optional)
[above are Song Tags with notes imported from EasyWorship]

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
C
Open my eyes Lord
I want to see Jesus
To reach out and touch Him
And say that I love Him

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Open my ears Lord
And help me to listen
Open my eyes Lord
I want to see Jesus

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
Open my heart Lord
melt me and mold me
make me a vessel
to pour out your spirit

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
To bring joy and gladness
to those who have sorrow
open my eyes Lord
I want to see Jesus

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
Open our eyes Lord
We want to see Jesus
To reach out and touch Him
And say that we love Him

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
Open our ears Lord
And help us to listen
Open our eyes Lord
We want to see Jesus
